name: DMT DMT Extra-Coarse 4" Diamond Whetstone
description: An effective and easy-to-use sharpening tool. Micron-sized diamonds are embedded in an electro-plated nickel matrix on the perforated steel plate. A unique pattern of recessed plastic islands speeds sharpening by clearing away fines.Diamond, the hardest material known, is the most efficient abrasive for sharpening and honing all knives.Flat surface should never hollow or groove.Uses only water for lubrication - no messy oils.Abrades steel, tungsten carbide, titanium, ceramic, glass, etc.Vinyl case included.
